result.name: trish-trustees-register
result.notes: Stores details of trustees and who TPR have appointed to Schemes. Go-Live July 1st 2010.  Trustees apply to be on the Register with the aim of getting work from TPR

organization.name: the-pensions-regulator
organization.title: The Pensions Regulator
organization.description:
The Pensions Regulator (TPR) is the UK regulator of work-based pension schemes. It works with trustees, employers, pension specialists and business advisers, giving guidance on what is expected of them.

TPR is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.thepensionsregulator.gov.uk/

result.title: TRISH Trustees Register

extras.value: Not due to be released. Contains personal data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
